title: Meta Is Said to Plan Significant Job Cuts This Week
description: Mark Zuckerberg, Meta’s chief executive, said last month that many “teams will stay flat or shrink over the next year” as his company faces economic challenges.

title: Twitter Said to Delay Changes to Check Mark Badges Until After Midterm Election
description: Users and employees had raised concerns that Elon Musk’s plan to give check marks to those who paid a monthly fee could be misused to sow discord.

title: British Soccer, Brought to You by American Crypto Optimism
description: A group of American cryptocurrency investors is trying to turn an obscure English soccer club into “the internet’s team,” with a global following of crypto enthusiasts.
